transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Sir.
Executive: Yes.
Executive: Aapka jo number hai na, woh IndiaMART se registered hai. Isiliye aap call kar rahe honge na, turant cut ja raha hoga aur call kuch nahi ho raha hoga. IndiaMART se registered number hai.
Customer: Aisa hai?
Executive: Haan, woh maine bhi kiya hai toh mere se bhi nahi ho raha. Kyunki hum log IndiaMART se registered number hai hum log ka. Isliye dikkat hai. Aapke agar koi, haan, main bata rahi hu. Agar aapka koi aisa bhai ho ya phir koi dost ho ya phir aapke paas koi staff ho, unke phone mein na aap IndiaMART buyer ka ek app aata hai. Jaise aapka seller ka app hai phone mein, waise IndiaMART buyer ka app aata hai. Usko download kijiye aur jo number hai usse register kariye phir call kariye customer ko. Turant lagega sir.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ji sir. Ek baar karke dekhiye, check kar lijiye phir mujhe call kar lijiyega ek baar. Thik hai sir?
Customer: Kya karwa rahe ho aap log yaar.
Executive: Kya hua sir?
Customer: Thik hai, kya kya karna padta hai.
Executive: Main call, main call pe hu. Aap karo, aap kar lo. Main call pe hu.
Customer: Matlab kya karna hai? Dusre mobile mein IndiaMART download karu?
Executive: IndiaMART buyer download karna hai.
Customer: Haan, IndiaMART buyer.
Executive: Haan, ya phir aapko na direct. Usme se mujhe bechne wala milega?
Executive: Haan, buyer milenge. Jaise aap seller ke phone mein IndiaMART seller. Mujhe buyer nahi chahiye, main buyer nahi chahiye.
Executive: I know, as a buyer aap hai na. Mujhe seller chahiye.
Executive: Aap as a buyer toh hai na.
Customer: Haan, main buyer hu.
Executive: Haan, toh woh buyer ke liye hota hai. As a buyer aap waha register karenge apna.
Customer: Achha, samajh gaya. Woh saare kharidne wale hi woh app download karte hai. Uske andar saare bechne wale milte hai.
Executive: Haan, seller ke saare. Thik hai, woh dusre mobile mein download karta hu, woh dusre number se karke login karke direct call karunga toh direct buyer ko, seller ko contact hoga.
Executive: Haan, seller ko contact hoga. Kyunki aapka aur mera number registered hai IndiaMART mein. Is wajah se hum log ke phone se nahi ho raha hai. Maine bhi try kiya hai.
Customer: Mere toh. Kyunki hum already supply, kyunki hum log already waha pe registered hai na number, aisa hota hai.
Executive: First time.
Executive: Kyunki jaisa ki aap log kehte hai ki IndiaMART se call aaya tha, bol raha tha ki main toh khud hi supplier hu, main toh khud hi yeh kar raha hu. Woh isi process ke liye hai.
Customer: IndiaMART ko mujhe clone karna padega ab.
Executive: Kya karna padega sir?
Customer: Clone ho jayega clone?
Executive: Clone?
Customer: Woh app ho jayega ek mein se do IndiaMART?
Executive: Pata nahi kya bol rahe mujhe samajh nahi aa raha aapka baat sir.
Customer: Are mam app cloner aata hai na, app cloner. Samajh mein aaya kya?
Executive: Nahi sir.
Customer: Nahi, woh bhi nahi raha ab toh. Rahega bhi kaha se.
Executive: Aap abhi na jo kisi ka phone lekar ke aap download karke check karo. Main call pe hu, aap check kar lo ek baar.
Customer: Kisi ka, mera hi log out karke usme karta hu na.
Executive: Haan, jo register nahi hai toh usme kar lijiye, ho jayega kuch.



Hello.
Customer: Abhi?
Customer: Tu kaha se log out karte hai mam?
Executive: Simple baat hai.
Customer: Log out karte hai mam?
Customer: Haan, ho gaya.

Customer: Isme jo aapka personal number hai na, woh number daliye ek baar phir se. Ek minute mein hold karo, phone aaya.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Bolo te.
Customer: Kem?
Customer: Atli budhi jarur che.
Customer: Ek minute, ek minute chalu rakhjo mama. Mam isme buy aur sell hai, main buy pe click karu na?
Executive: Haan, buy mein.
Customer: Sir, aage aao. Bolo ne mama, bolo bolo.
Customer: E hu jarur padi tamare, aave to che paine mahine pagar.

Customer: Hu bhini che pan vadi.

Customer: Mari paase paise to che mama, mare.
Customer: Tane khabar che, tane khabar che.
Customer: Me che ne mama, tane khabar che Ramesh mama paase thi me paisa lidha hamna.
Customer: Puchi ne lidha lakh rupiya Ramesh mama ne aapo em.
Customer: Hova do ne, pai na be jip rakhya marai gaya atare.
Customer: Andar halo nakho halo tamara.
Customer: Haan, aame nakhi do halo tar tamne.
Customer: Haan mam boliye.
Executive: Ho gaya waha pe search kariye product search kariye.
Customer: Haan mam woh toh ho gaya hai. Login toh ho gaya hai dusre number se.
Executive: Haan, toh waha pe upar na ek search bar de raha hoga, waha pe aapko apna product search karna hoga.
Customer: Woh toh utna toh main bhi aata hai search karo.
Executive: Haan, toh waha pe search kariyega.
Customer: Plastic bottle scrap.


Customer: 790.
Customer: Chalo mam search kar diya. Waha pe call kar lijiyega please ji. Shukriya mam.
Customer: Aai lo ne.
Customer: Aai jese sir toh sahi rehta hai.
Customer: Achha, thik hai chalo.
Executive: Thik hai sir karke dekho aur side mein aapka concern close kar rahi hu phir. Thik hai sir?
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Okay. Thank you sir.
Customer: Okay, thank you.
Customer: Nakhi do halo mama.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer unable to make calls through IndiaMART.

- Wants to search for sellers on the app.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the IndiaMART buyer app process.

- Executive guided to search for product after login.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will try the suggested steps.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- app, buyer, seller, download, register
